transcript.title: VISIT BY THE VICE-PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES
transcript.content:
F76/ 55
PRIME MINISTER
FOR PRESS23 March 1976
VISIT B. Y THR VICE-PRES. IDEN. T. OF THE. UNITED STATES
The Vice-President of the United States ( Mr Nelson Rockefeller)
and Mrs Nelson Rockefeller will visit Australia as part of the
U. S. Bi-Centennial Celebrations next week.
After visiting Canberra on Tuesday 30 March the Vice-President
will travel to Sydney on Wedensday 31 March and leave for
overseas on Thursday morning 1 April.
SPROGRAMME F. OR CANBERRA.
Tuesday 30 March 8.30 a. m.
Morning
Afternoon Evening
Wednesday 31 March Morning Ceremonial arrival at RAAF Base
Fairbairn. Stay at Lakeside Hotel
Visit to United States Embassy
Lays wreath at Australian War Memorial
Lunch at Governent House
News Conference at the Lakeside Hotel
Discussions with the Prime Minister
Reception at the United States Embassy
Discussions with the Prime Minister and
Ministers of State at The Lodge
Dinner at The Lodge
Discussions with the Leader of the
Opposition Ceremonial departure from RAAF
Base Fairbairn
A
Jjj A UST LIA11
